section.title: Graphics

para.sentence: See Figures 23.16.1–23.16.3 for the modular functions \lambda , J , and \eta.
In Figures 23.16.2 and 23.16.3, height corresponds to the absolute value of the function and color to the phase.

section.sentence: Figure 23.16.1: Modular functions \lambda\left(iy\right) , J\left(iy\right) , \eta\left(iy\right) for 0\leq y\leq 3 . See also Figure .
Figure 23.16.2: Elliptic modular function \lambda\left(x+iy\right) for -0.25\leq x\leq 0.25 , 0.005\leq y\leq 0.1 .
Figure 23.16.3: Dedekind’s eta function \eta\left(x+iy\right) for -0.0625\leq x\leq 0.0625 , 0.0001\leq y\leq 0.07 .
